ActivityMetadata.Name: GH Update information about a GitHub Pages site
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH Update information about a GitHub Pages site
ActivityMetadata.Description: Updates information for a GitHub Pages site. For more information, see "[About GitHub Pages](/github/working-with-github-pages/about-github-pages).
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

Update information about a GitHub Pages site

Updates information for a GitHub Pages site. For more information, see "[About GitHub Pages](/github/working-with-github-pages/about-github-pages).

Method: Put

OperationID: repos/update-information-about-pages-site

EndPoint:

/repos/{owner}/{repo}/pages
